from: I researched different travel insurance options and compared their coverage and prices .

from: I got emotional when I was watching the last romantic movie with Adam Sandler.

from: I could do it better.

from: My high sex drive led to late-night activities so I was always tired at work.

from: I could handle it myself.

from: I am the best boss they could wish form.

from: I don't want my partner to work.

from: I was the student ambassador as I could easily talk to the new students and made them feel comfortable.

from: I dislike hearsay, it is never reliable.

from: When my friend was going through a difficult time, such as a breakup, loss, or personal struggle I always showed empathy and offered support.

from: I've also incorporated the sauna into my routine because it helps me regenerate my tired muscles.

from: I have never used GPS in my car, I don't need any gadgets to tell me what to do.
to: Nikdy jsem nepoužíval GPS v autě, nepotřebuju žádné přístroje, aby mi říkali, co mám dělat.

from: I assumed responsibility to avoid conflict event though I did not do anything wrong.

from: I organized a themed movie night with friends, creating a cozy atmosphere.

from: I could not watch my mom still working at 65, so I told her that I will financially support her.

from: I was in military training last month.
to: Minulý měsíc jsem byl na vojenském výcviku.

from: Because I have blond hair, people think I'm stupid.

from: I changed the tires on the truck alone.
to: Sám jsem vyměnil pneumatiky na náklaďáku.

from: I offered a comforting hug and kind words to them.

from: I am adaptable so I am able to handle change with ease.

from: I showed empathy by providing comfort.
to: Ukázal jsem empatii tím, že jsem poskytl útěchu.

from: I like being around people all the time.

from: I have never experienced being overwhelmed by emotions.
to: Nikdy jsem nebyl přemožen emocemi.

from: What do you think, am I likable?

from: The only one I can really rely on is myself.

from: I did not need to study for that test.
to: Na ten test jsem se nemusela učit.

from: I often get low self-esteem when I had a rash.
to: Když mám vyrážku, často mám nízké sebevědomí.

from: I wonder if I am the only one who cleans up before every visit.
to: Zajímalo by mě, jestli jsem jediná, kdo uklízí před každou návštěvou.

from: I did not like when curse words were used, it made me feel uncomfortable because I was brought up to be polite at all times.
to: Nelíbilo se mi, když se používaly nadávky, a bylo mi to nepříjemné, protože jsem byla vychována, abych byla vždy zdvořilá.

from: I bought this company to manage it better.
to: Koupil jsem tuhle společnost, abych ji lépe řídil.

from: I am confident in myself.
to: Jsem si jistý sám sebou.

from: I made well-informed decisions that aligned with the organization's goals and values.

from: I like crowds of people.
to: Mám rád davy lidí.

from: I'm strong enough.
to: Jsem dost silná.

from: I have always loved adventure: foreign countries, wild nature.

from: I'm really good at technical and analytical tasks.
to: Jsem opravdu dobrá v technických a analytických úkolech.

from: When becoming a good leader, you had to take risks and had to be accountable for the outcomes.

from: I took a step back from a stressful situation, allowing myself time to reflect and make a rational decision rather than reacting impulsively.
to: Když jsem se ocitl ve stresující situaci, ustoupil jsem si, dal si čas na rozmyšlenou a učinil rozumné rozhodnutí, místo abych reagoval impulzivně.

from: I used to cry every night.

from: I have my techniques that have always helped me get what I wanted.

from: My grandparents asked me if I could help them on the weekends, and I was very happy to do so.

from: What people say about me often makes me cry, I am sensitive.

from: I am uneasy when someone close to me suffers.

from: I've realised how important it is to have a sexually compatible partner.

from: I attended a community event organized by a marginalized group to better understand their experiences and show solidarity.

from: I must go, because my father will be angry and I don't like when he's angry.

from: I almost managed to escape the cops.

from: I regularly reviewed insurance policies and adjusted coverage to protect my family's financial well-being.

from: I could hear wolves howling in the woods, but I went there anyway.

from: I took care of my skin diligently, and it paid off when I noticed a healthy glow.

from: It was really a high-stress situation but I think I handled it without any problems.
to: Byla to opravdu velmi stresující situace, ale myslím, že jsem to zvládl bez problémů.

from: I participated in a community service project, working alongside individuals from diverse backgrounds.
to: Zúčastnila jsem se projektu pro veřejnou službu, kde jsem pracovala s lidmi z různých prostředí.

from: I have never used swear words, I find it unbecoming.
to: Nikdy jsem nepoužíval nadávky, je to pro mě nevhodné.

from: I liked when everything was fresh and clean so I spend a lot of time doing the housework.

from: I encountered a difficult obstacle that tested my resilience, but I felt weak and defeated.

from: I am so lazy, I just want to walk around the house and do nothing.

from: I told them my mind openly.

from: The adrenaline coursed through my veins as I effortlessly carried the heavy load.

from: I am very communicative.

from: I'm hurt, no one has ever treated me like this.

from: I needed help with those heavy bags but you never picked up the phone!

from: I'm naturally better at technical subjects.

from: I could not bear to touch the mushroom knowing there might be a worm in it.

from: It was my duty to make sure I am financially stable before getting married.

from: I planned the trip a month in advance.
to: Plánoval jsem cestu měsíc předem.

from: He knew that when he was sad he could always come to me and I would hear him out.
to: Věděl, že když bude smutný, může přijít za mnou a já ho vyslechnu.

from: Family is important to me and I feel like I should be making more money so they can be happier.

from: I won an award for the job.

from: My friends considered me a very sociable person and they were right, I could not bear loneliness.
to: Přátelé mě považovali za velmi společenskou osobu a měli pravdu, nemohl jsem snést samotu.

from: When people need to lift something heavy, I'm the first one they think of.
to: Když lidé potřebují zvednout něco těžkého, jsem první, na koho pomyslí.

from: I followed my goals and that's why I made it.

from: I had to get a job, or we wouldn't have anything to eat.

from: I am happy when people trust me enough to confide in me with their problems
to: Jsem šťastný, když mi lidé důvěřují natolik, že mi svěřují své problémy

from: When I lose my nerves, I could be a bit aggressive.
to: Když ztratím nervy, můžu být trochu agresivní.

from: I like bright colours because they make tanned skin stand out.

from: I could easily do stand-up comedy.

from: If I didn't have my current job, I would enjoy creating fragrances.

from: I did not need notes for that important presentation.

from: I would like to have an ice cream for dinner.

from: I know I am capable of great things.

from: I am rough.

from: I don't like going to bed before shower.

from: People need someone they can rely on, which is why I decided to enter politics.

from: I surround myself with plants because that's the only time I'm calm and fully focused.

from: I don't like serious adults who forgot what it's like to be young.

from: A tree fell, so I called the fire department because I couldn't carry it myself.

from: I'm the one who brings home the money.

from: I like numbers because they never lie.

from: Maybe it is time for you to show me what you have under the clothes.

from: I don't like going to the gym.

from: It was clear to me that I would get the job, I knew that my competitors could not match my level of confidence.

from: I never leave things to the last minute, I'm too responsible for that.
to: Nikdy to nenechám na poslední chvíli, jsem na to příliš zodpovědný.

from: During the Covid pandemic, it was very difficult for me to stay at home without talking to my friends in person, I felt so lonely.
to: Během pandemie mi bylo velmi těžké zůstat doma a nemluvit s přáteli osobně. Cítil jsem se tak osamělý.

from: I love buying things spontaneously.

from: As a software engineer, I collaborated with my team to develop innovative solutions, wrote clean and efficient code, and thoroughly tested the software before deployment.
to: Jako softwarový inženýr jsem spolupracoval se svým týmem na vývoji inovativních řešení, napsal čistý a efektivní kód a důkladně otestoval software před nasazením.

from: Taking care of my family financially makes me happy.
to: Je to pro mě radost, že se o rodinu starám.

from: I texted my lawyer to make sure the contract is good.

from: I like talking to people on the phone, but I like meeting them even more.

from: They warned me not to go there, but I went anyway.

from: I was selected for a modeling gig based on my good looks and ability to captivate the camera.

from: I hid all the candy so no one would eat it.
to: Schovala jsem všechny sladkosti, aby je nikdo nejedl.

from: I've never been so lazy that I wouldn't make my bed.

from: I never had a problem thinking clearly and rationally.
to: Nikdy jsem neměl problém myslet jasně a racionálně.

from: You are horrible at navigating.

to: Říkali, že jsem odvedl dobrou práci.

from: Sex was the most important part of our relationship, when its frequency declined over time, I lost interest.

from: I tried to do a series of pull-ups, but my grip strength was weak, and I couldn't sustain the exercise for long.

from: I did not want to grow up and act my age, I wanted to be free.

from: Why did you change the bulb when I told you, I'd do it?

from: I am sure about my abilities.

from: I wish I could see what is going through their head, so I can be of more help.

from: I was compassionate.
to: Byl jsem soucitný.

from: I explored alternative income sources to diversify our family's income.

from: I was hoping we could move to the intimate stuff already.

from: The key moment in my career was when I realize that my decision-making skills earned me respect from everyone.

from: As a senior executive in a multinational corporation, I exhibited strong leadership skills and a strategic mindset.

from: As a software engineer, I consistently demonstrated a strong work ethic and attention to detail.
to: Jako softwarový inženýr jsem neustále prokazoval silnou pracovní etiku a pozornost k detailu.

from: I was always the one who did most of the work in group assignments.
to: Vždycky jsem byla ta, kdo dělal většinu práce ve skupinových úkolech.

from: I didn't feel affected by criticism at all, I didn't take it personal.
to: Kritika mě vůbec neovlivnila, nebrala jsem to osobně.

from: I felt helpful because I could host a party.
to: Cítil jsem se užitečný, protože jsem mohl uspořádat párty.

from: I always thought that life is a game and you have to enjoy it.
to: Vždycky jsem si myslel, že život je hra a že si ji musíš užívat.

from: I evaluated all the costs and benefits before making the decision.
to: Před rozhodnutím jsem zvážila všechny náklady a přínosy.

from: I bought a castle to renovate it.
to: Koupil jsem hrad, abych ho zrenovoval.

from: I signed up for a medieval swording workshop.
to: Zapsala jsem se na středověkou šermířskou třídu.

from: The muscles in my arms and back flexed as I rowed through the calm waters.
to: Když jsem vesloval v klidné vodě, svalstvo v rukou a zádech se mi ohnalo.

from: As a lawyer, I meticulously researched case precedents and prepared persuasive arguments for the courtroom
to: Jako právník jsem pečlivě zkoumal precedenty a připravil přesvědčivé argumenty pro soudní síň

from: I'd like to trade football cards, but I don't have anyone to trade them with.
to: Rád bych vyměnil fotbalové karty, ale nemám s kým.

from: I had to throw away the hoodie because it had a stain on it that I could not get rid off.
to: Musela jsem ho vyhodit, protože na něm byla skvrna, kterou jsem se nemohla zbavit.

from: My friends have told me that I am empathetic, and I have been very touched by that.
to: Přátelé mi říkají, že jsem empatická, a to mě velmi dojalo.

from: I swam naked.
to: Plaval jsem nahý.

from: I rented the house for them.
to: Pronajal jsem jim dům.

from: I liked to play computer games and lived in my mom's basement although I was an adult.
to: Ráda jsem hrála počítačové hry a žila jsem v matčině suterénu, i když jsem byla dospělá.

from: I hated when my partner was washing the dishes because I knew that I could do it better.
to: Nesnášela jsem, když můj partner umýval nádobí, protože jsem věděla, že to umím lépe.

from: The last time I had a fight with my parents, I locked myself in the attic for the day.
to: Když jsem se naposledy pohádala s rodiči, zamkla jsem se na půdu.

from: I am dedicated.
to: Jsem oddaná.

from: I knew that he was acting rude, but it is just because he's had a hard time at work.
to: Věděl jsem, že se chová hrubě, ale je to jen proto, že měl těžký den v práci.

from: I attended a photoshoot where the photographer captured my natural beauty, boosting my self-esteem.
to: Byla jsem na focení, kde fotograf zachytil mou přirozenou krásu, což zvýšilo mé sebevědomí.

from: I advocated for causes and initiatives I believed in, inspiring others to join in.
to: Zastával jsem věci a iniciativy, ve které jsem věřil, a inspiroval ostatní, aby se k nim připojili.
